TabHomeActivity.title: 主頁
TabHomeActivity.biotitle: DNA甲基化檢測生物的年齡
TabHomeActivity.1ml: 僅需1毫升唾液樣本即可進行檢測，方便又安全。
TabHomeActivity.testresult: 收集到的樣本會寄回到實驗室進行檢測，測試結果會經由應用程式發送給你app。
TabHomeActivity.1ml2: 生物年齡僅需通過1ml唾液樣本來測量。
TabHomeActivity.question: 全面的問卷調查
TabHomeActivity.international: 與國際知名醫學協會建議的合作
TabHomeActivity.machinelearn: 應用程序連結到機械學習系統
TabHomeActivity.affacthealth: SAM-e 是人體中存在的天然化合物，平衡人體人體健康。
TabHomeActivity.supplement: SAM-e是一種營養補充劑，並非藥物。
TabHomeActivity.disclaimertext: 計畫免疫試驗不用於健康資訊或醫療數據，也不用於篩選、診斷、治療、預防或評估任何疾病或條件的風險。計畫免疫服務是一種基於DNA甲基化評估的錶觀遺傳年齡測定。我們沒有收集基因數據。該測試適用於21歲或以上的個人。這項服務尚未得到美國食品和藥物管理局的準予。
TabHomeActivity.allright: @2019 HKG epi THERAPEUTICS Ltd. All Rights Reserved

LifeStyleChartActivity.title: 生活習慣調查問卷
LifeStyleChartActivity.healthy: 健康或不健康的生活方式極有可能代代相傳。根據Case等人的研究
LifeStyleChartActivity.become: （2002年），當一個0-3歲的孩子有一個母親實行健康的生活方式時，這個孩子變得健康並採用同樣生活方式的可能性將新增27%。
LifeStyleChartActivity.instance: 例如，高收入的父母更有可能吃有機食品，有時間鍛煉，為孩子提供最好的生活條件；另一方面，低收入的父母更有可能參與吸烟等不健康活動，幫助他們釋放與貧困有關的壓力和抑鬱。
LifeStyleChartActivity.teacher: 父母是每個孩子的第一位老師。父母所做的一切都很可能通過學習過程轉移給孩子。
LifeStyleChartActivity.source: 資料來源：Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
LifeStyleChartActivity.range: 如果你的身體質量指數低於18.5，屬於體重不足範圍。
LifeStyleChartActivity.bmi: 如果你的身體質量指數是18.5到24.9，屬於正常或健康的體重範圍。
LifeStyleChartActivity.falls: 如果你的身體質量指數是25.0到29.9，屬於超重範圍。
LifeStyleChartActivity.your: 如果你的體重指數是30.0或更高，則屬於肥胖範圍。
LifeStyleChartActivity.resting: 靜止心率意味著(非運動時)需要心臟輸送的最低血量。
LifeStyleChartActivity.ill: 當身體沒有生病的情況下，一般人坐卧時；
LifeStyleChartActivity.hearting: 情處於放鬆的情況下，心跳率通常在60到100之間。
LifeStyleChartActivity.bloods: 血壓低於120/80 mmHG被認為是在正常範圍內。
LifeStyleChartActivity.adults: 所有20歲或以上的成年人應每四至六年進行一次膽固醇檢查。
LifeStyleChartActivity.most: 冥想能帶來大量好處，包括改善集中力，有助神經鬆弛。更可舒緩壓力和疲勞。
LifeStyleChartActivity.minutes: 每週至少進行150分鐘的中等強度有氧運動或每週75分鐘的劇烈有氧運動，或兩者結合，最好在一周內進行。
LifeStyleChartActivity.morethan: 國家睡眠基金會建議18-64歲人仕每日所需睡眠時間為7-9小時。8歲至25歲人仕每日不應少於6小時睡眠；同時不應多於11小時睡眠。26歲至64歲人仕每日不應少於6小時睡眠；不應多於10小時睡眠。
LifeStyleChartActivity.drink: 女性每天不超過1杯酒；男性每天不超過2杯酒。
LifeStyleChartActivity.recommended: 12個月以下兒童每日建議維他命D攝取量為400 IU。年齡介乎1-70歲人仕建議攝取量為600 IU；70歲以上人仕建議攝取量為800IU。
LifeStyleChartActivity.daily: 成年男性每日建議維他命C攝取量為90毫克。成年女性每日建議維他命C攝取量為75毫克
LifeStyleChartActivity.women: 成年男性每日建議維他命A攝取量為900微克。成年女性每日建議維他命A攝取量為700微克

DnaReportActivity.title: 生物年齡
DnaReportActivity.look: 每人均有不同的衰老進程。有人看似/感覺自己比真實年齡蒼老，有人則看起來比真實年齡年輕。
DnaReportActivity.parameter: 我們的生物學年齡比我們的實際年齡更能反映我們的健康狀況和壽命。
DnaReportActivity.hardware: 假設DNA是負責運行我們身體運行的硬件。基因序列就是作業系統。DNA甲基化與其他表觀遺傳要素就是負責編寫基因組。
DnaReportActivity.shift: 隨著Horvath量度過百個於DNA中的定位發現的了“表觀遺傳時鐘”，生物年齡標記的研究發生了範式轉移。 “表觀遺傳時鐘”是研究生物年齡的一種量度指標。
DnaReportActivity.clock: 部份人中，由錶觀遺傳時鐘量測的“錶觀遺傳年齡”和由行事曆量測的“實際年齡”非常相似。當1是一個完美的相關性時，這兩個名額在人群中的相關性接近於0.9。
DnaReportActivity.different: 然而部分人的生物年齡會與實際年齡不乎：有可能”表觀遺傳時鐘”會比“實齡時鐘”走得更快。我們認為當上述兩者之差距超出標準差（或實驗人口的常態分佈）代表一種著顯著的轉變。
DnaReportActivity.studies: 研究表明，加速的“錶觀遺傳時鐘”可能與一些與年齡相關的慢性疾病（如心血管疾病和晚期癌症）的風險新增有關。 (link: https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/?term=epigenetic+clock+disease). 然而這主張仍然處於開放討論階段；需要更多深入研究。
DnaReportActivity.cg: 透過廣泛的數據挖掘之後，我們發現了一個與年齡相關的CG甲基化區域，足以通過唾液預測生物年齡。
DnaReportActivity.dna: 由你的唾液樣本，我們會於不同的基因組以次世代定序及亞硫酸鹽定序量度你的DNA甲基化水平。你的DNA甲基化水平會經由數學公式計算出你的”表觀遺傳”年齡。
DnaReportActivity.redflag: 當你的表觀遺傳年齡與實際年齡出現分歧，這可能是由你身體發出的警號。透過研究所得數據的標準差，我們分析出總測試人口樣本中平均年齡的誤差分配為 +/- 5 歲。假如你的表觀遺傳年齡較實際年齡大5年，這可視作你身體發出的警號。透過累積更多研究數據，我們相信能得出一套更準確的常態分佈。
DnaReportActivity.changes: 縱使現時尚未明確確定如何能夠減慢某人的”表觀遺傳時鐘”，不少全球各地的醫藥組織均建議可由改變生活模式方面入手。當生物年齡過度老化，這代表著某人有需要作出生活模式的改變。
DnaReportActivity.act: 這種“红色”警號有助你及時改變生活習慣或向醫生提出咨詢
DnaReportActivity.do: 假若我的表觀遺傳年齡
DnaReportActivity.genetics: 與遺傳學的主張相反，“表觀遺傳學”認為飲食習慣與生活模式的改變是可以逆轉生物時鐘。
DnaReportActivity.open: 初步研究表明，飲食改變可能導致某些人的生物時鐘減慢。這仍處於開放討論階段。 ( https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/30350398)
DnaReportActivity.exercise: 生活模式的改變包括運動和飲食習慣的改變。雖然已被國家醫學協會推薦了一段時間，但是我們需要更多關於較高效的改變的數據；這些改變應該經過個性化設計的。
DnaReportActivity.way: 有無數用戶與我們分享經驗，我們才能夠向測試人仕改善咨詢質素；同時持續分析生活模式改變所帶來的影響。透過共享科技(如應用程式和人工智能) ，我們可以查出不同生活習慣會如何影響生物時鐘。
DnaReportActivity.links: 我們的應用程式會把由美國國家醫學協會推薦的生活模式資訊及建議經超鏈結提供及閣下；同時會推介相關營養補充品例如 SAMe, 維他命A, D 及C。
DnaReportActivity.updated: 這些資料會經常更新；我們建議用家定時參考鏈結的內容。這些建議是基於“科學”今天所知道的。雖然並不完美，隨著更多的數據和更多的分析，我們的科學也在改進提升。
DnaReportActivity.first: 我們的報告首先會顯示閣下的生活方式參數與建議參數的分別。你能參考第一份報告的分析結果決定進行怎樣的改變。
DnaReportActivity.suggest: 我們建議你能持之以恆的更新你的生活模式數據。
DnaReportActivity.update: 你能自行選擇資料更新的時間和頻率；再按需要更新某部分/全部問卷內容。當然，我們認為生物年齡檢測只有持續地研究生活方式、環境和健康管理系統,為您提供更好的分析。
DnaReportActivity.second: 我們建議6個月或最多1年內閣下要進行另一次唾液樣本測試。
DnaReportActivity.anonymized: 閣下提供的數據及個人身份會保持機密。所有用家提供的數據會以匿名狀態交由人工智能進行分析以發展一套模型；用作量度改變生活集慣對生物時鐘的影響。
DnaReportActivity.model: 當累積到足夠研究數據，模型便會分析閣下提供的數據；並與你分享研究結果。
DnaReportActivity.analyze: 我們會進一步分析你的生物年齡及生活模式轉變的進度。
DnaReportActivity.routes: 基於研究模型的分析與閣下提供的數據，我們會建議可能的生活模式改變方向。
DnaReportActivity.coevolve: 我們希望能夠一同的改善閣下的健康的同時，一同令epiAging學習環境更進一步。
DnaReportActivity.otherolder: 其他人與測試者對比，他們的生物年齡比實際年齡大
DnaReportActivity.otheryounger: 其他被測試的人，他們的生物年齡比實際年齡小

CompanyActivity.title: 公司簡介
CompanyActivity.nextgeneration: 我們現正研發新一代DNA甲基化生物標記, 用於早期癌症檢測和維持健康的衰老進程
CompanyActivity.ecosystem: 我們致力於建設一個全新的健康生態系統，用以提供個性化指導; 方便大眾尋找和管理適合自己的健康生活。
CompanyActivity.ittechnology: 在IT技術和基因甲基化檢測的幫助下，我們相信大眾市民能夠掌控自己的健康。

MethylationActivity.title: DNA Methylation
MethylationActivity.mark: DNA methylation is a chemical mark on DNA
MethylationActivity.added: DNA methylation is a chemical mark that is added to DNA at different positions during gestation.
MethylationActivity.epigenetic: DNA methylation is part of the 'epigenetic'program of our genes.
MethylationActivity.happens: When DNA methylation happens at several important positions in genes it can silence the function of the gene.
MethylationActivity.expressed: This is how the same gene can be expressed or silenced in different cells in our body.
MethylationActivity.minicomputer: If we imagine that our DNA is a minicomputer running our cells then:
MethylationActivity.Operating: The genetic Sequence - is the Operating system.
MethylationActivity.Softwre: DNA methylation is the - Softwre coding Apps on DNA.
MethylationActivity.specific: Different 'Apps' make cells perform specific tasks in space and time.
MethylationActivity.silent: These genomic Apps make sure that our body functions properly. Each tissue is properly programmed to ensure our health and well being. Each cell type has its unique combination of methylation marks and as a consequence a unique combination of genes that are active and silent.
MethylationActivity.disease: Changes in DNA methylation can cause disease; mapping DNA methylation changes could detect disease
MethylationActivity.tissue: Changes in DNA methylation alter the way cells and tissues operate and can convert a healthy tissue to a diseased tissue.
MethylationActivity.cancer: More than three decades ago Szyf has suggested that changes in DNA methylation would cause diseases such as cancer.
MethylationActivity.methylation: Therefore, DNA methylation is a great platform for detecting and treating disease.
MethylationActivity.studies: Studies from the laboratory of Szyf at McGill University showed that one can reverse cancer in an animal model by blocking the protein that adds methylation groups to DNA. This has been replicated by many studies since.
MethylationActivity.early: More recently Szyf has shown that by examining DNA methylation in white blood cells, it is possible to detect liver cancer early.
MethylationActivity.environment: The environment can cause changes in DNA methylation
MethylationActivity.conditions: Studies by Jirtle and his colleagues in 2004 showed in a mouse model that maternal diet during pregnancy affects DNA methylation of her offspring and change their coat color and rish of obesity and other conditions.
MethylationActivity.psychiatry: Studies by Szyf and colleagues discovered that maternal care and behavior affects DNA methylation of her offspring and how they react to stress later in life. These studies launched the fields of behavioral epigenetics and epigenetic psychiatry.
MethylationActivity.discoveries: These discoveries provided the first evidence that both psychological and physical environments can affect DNA methylation.
MethylationActivity.ventions: DNA methylation is potentially reversible by both physical and behavioral interventions
MethylationActivity.events: Studies suggest that different environmental changes can change or reverse DNA methylation events.
MethylationActivity.changes: Thus, the potential is there that we might be able to change DNA methylation by lifestyle changes.
MethylationActivity.reversible: Our optimism about DNA methylation derives from the fact that DNA methylation in difference from genetics is reversible.
MethylationActivity.clock: DNA methylation and the epigenetic clock
MethylationActivity.paradigm: A paradigm shift in the search for biological age markers has happened with the discovery of the 'epigenetic clock' by Horvath.
MethylationActivity.discovered: It was discovered that the level of methylation of certain genes in our DNA changes as we age.
MethylationActivity.measuring: By measuring methylation in these genes it is possible to determine our biological age.
MethylationActivity.biological: Our biological age is a better measure of our health and well being than chronological age.
MethylationActivity.acceleration: Studies show that acceleration of ' DNA methylation age' is a predictor of early death and chronic disease.
MethylationActivity.bydietary: Experiments in animals show that it is possible to reverse the biological clock bydietary changes.
MethylationActivity.epi: @2019 HKG epi THERAPEUTICS Ltd. All Rights Reserved

ConsentActivity.title: User consent form
ConsentActivity.customer: HKG epi THERAPEUTICS Customer Data Consent Form
ConsentActivity.registering: Before registering, please read the following terms of service carefully.
ConsentActivity.your: EPIAGING APP is  about to save your
ConsentActivity.personal: personal medical data on the EpiAging Mobile App and the data analysis engine in the 'cloud', which requires your information and consent. Your identity is blinded and you will be provided with an ID number. Your personal identity will not be stored in the mobile app or the server. Once you download the app you will be assigned an ID that will allow you to retrieve your data and receive health reports , but your identity will remain unknown either on the app or the 'cloud' analysis engine.
ConsentActivity.designed: designed to help you to harness the power of your epigenome for healthy aging by providing you with a DNA methylation-based assessment of your true biological age and by providing you links and recommendations of reputable national medical societies on life style changes that can improve your health. It is your decision what changes to make.However, we are asking you to share with us
ConsentActivity.changes: the changes that you have made using the simple entry buttons in the app, these data will be streamed to a machine learning engine that will analyze your life style changes and provide you with a periodical report. Testing your biological age periodically using our  DNA methylation test  will help you assess progress. We ask you to share the changes that you have made with others and thus become a partner in a joint effort to improve your and other people health.
ConsentActivity.obligated: You are not obligated to answer the questions on this app and it is your decision what information to provide. Similarly, it is your decision to make or avoid life style changes and to attend or ignore the recommendations of the different medical associations that we are providing you with. However, the richer the data, the better and more helpful the analysis will be to you and others in the
ConsentActivity.analyzing: By analyzing data streaming from many other app users with “machine learning”, we will derive combinations of life style alterations that may have a positive impact on reducing the speed of aging.
ConsentActivity.believe: We believe that good health requires partnership of many people sharing their experiences and learning from each other rather than a unidirectional flow of instructions from the “learned” health provider to the “patient”. We know that medical science is imperfect, and its progress involves trial and error.We will learn together as “partners” by sharing experiences, assessing progress and using the best of machine learning technology to analyze the data that you provide and get feedbacks that will guide further improvement. By learning from many people that will be engaged as you are, we will be able to work together on improving our and other people health. We understand that it is a strict requirement that your data remains absolutely 'blinded' and that your personal identity remains anonymous. Only if these rules of anonymity are strictly adhered to, we will be able to freely participate in this grand partnership.
ConsentActivity.accordance: In accordance with the Data Protection Regulations with regards to data protection, you have the right to request access to and rectification or erasure of your personal data or restriction of processing concerning your data or to object to processing as well as the right to data portability. You can exercise this right by contacting (info@hkgepitherapeutics.com).Your name and identity will be encrypted and firewalled. Following your signature you will receive a blinded ID that will allow you to provide data and remain anonymous to the system.
ConsentActivity.ved: @2019 HKG epi THERAPEUTICS Ltd. All Rights Reserved

McGillChartActivity.title: McGill Pain Questionnaires
McGillChartActivity.wideused: Introduction: The Mcgill Pain Questionnaire(MPQ)(] has become one of the most wideused tests for the measurement of pain.
McGillChartActivity.provides: It provides valuable information on thesensory, affective and evaluative dimensions of pain experience and is capablediscriminating among differentproblems [7].
McGillChartActivity.several: The MPQ is not a perfect tooland several variants have been developed [2, 4,7]. Yet despite the usefulness ofspecialized alternative forms,
McGillChartActivity.research: the original MPQ is still commonly used in diagnosisand research on a wide variety of pain problems [7]
McGillChartActivity.feel: What Does Your Pain Feel Like?
McGillChartActivity.following: Statement: Some of the following words below describe your present pain. Circle ONLY those words that best describe it. Leave out any category that is not suitable. Use only a single word in each appropriate category - the one that applies best.

MoodChartActivity.title: Mood Questionnaires
MoodChartActivity.emotions: When it comes to emotions, it can sometimes be hard to recognise or admit that we're not feeling 100%
MoodChartActivity.short: If you are 16 or over, take this short questionnaire to
MoodChartActivity.fortnight: (1) Help you better understand how you've been feeling over the last fortnight
MoodChartActivity.advice: (2) Point you in the right direction for helpful advice and information
MoodChartActivity.things: How often have you had little interest or pleasure in doing things?
MoodChartActivity.hopeless: How often have you been bothered by feeling down, depressed or hopeless?
MoodChartActivity.asleep: How often have you been bothered by trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much?
MoodChartActivity.energy: How often have you been bothered by feeling tired or having little energy?
MoodChartActivity.appetite: How often have you been bothered by poor appetite or overeating?
MoodChartActivity.family: How often have you been bothered by feeling bad about yourself, or that you are a failure, or have let yourself or your family down?
MoodChartActivity.reading: How often have you been bothered by trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television?
MoodChartActivity.usual: How often have you been bothered by moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed,or the opposite - being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual?
MoodChartActivity.anxious: How often have you been bothered by feeling nervous, anxious or on edge?
MoodChartActivity.worrying: How often have you been bothered by not being able to stop or control worrying?
MoodChartActivity.different: How often have you been bothered by worrying too much about different things?
MoodChartActivity.relaxing: How often have you been bothered by having trouble relaxing?
MoodChartActivity.still: How often have you been bothered by being so restless that it is hard to sit still?
MoodChartActivity.irritable: How often have you been bothered by becoming easily annoyed or irritable?
MoodChartActivity.easily: How often have you been bothered by becoming easily annoyed or irritable?
MoodChartActivity.attack: Have you had an anxiety attack (suddenly feeling fear or panic)?

BiologicalActivity.title: Biological Age
BiologicalActivity.wrinkles: Stop counting your age by birthdays or candles on the cake, wrinkles, crow's feet or the frown lines on your face — those are only numbers. And today, the numbers don't count.
BiologicalActivity.different: People age at different rates. Some 'look' and 'feel' older than their chronological age while other look younger than their chronological age.
BiologicalActivity.better: Our biological age is a better parameter of our health well being and life span than our chronological age.
BiologicalActivity.hardware: ○ DNA is the hardware, genetics is the operating system and DNA methylation and other epigenetic factors are the software that programs the genome.
BiologicalActivity.epigenetics: ○ Importantly, 'epigenetics' in different from 'genetics' is potentially reversible by dietary interventions and lifestyle changes.
BiologicalActivity.suggest: ○ Studies suggest that accelerated 'epigenetic clock' might be associated with increased risk for several age related chronic disease such as cardiovascular disease and cancer at later age. (link:
BiologicalActivity.paradigm: ○ A paradigm shift in the search for biological age markers occurred with the discovery of the 'epigenetic clock' by Horvath, which is based on measurement of DNA methylation status at 500 strategic positions in DNA.
BiologicalActivity.still: ). This is however still an open field and more studies are needed.
BiologicalActivity.studies: ○ Preliminary studies are coming up that show that dietary changes can cause deceleration of epigenetic clock in certain people, however this is still an open life. (link:
BiologicalActivity.including: ○ Lifestyle changes including exercise and change in dietary habits have been recommended by national medical associations for some time, however we need more data about the most advisable changes and they should be personalized.
BiologicalActivity.learn: ○ One way for us to learn about advisable lifestyle changes is sharing our experiences with others and analyzing the impact of differences in lifestyle. This is now possible using sharing technologies such as Apps as well as artificial intelligence.
BiologicalActivity.extensive: ○ After extensive data mining, we have discovered a single age-related CG methylation region that was sufficient to accurately predict biological age using saliva.
BiologicalActivity.decelerate: ○ Although it is still not clear how one can decelerate his age lifestyle changes recommended by most national medical associations are perhaps a point to start. An older age is a 'red flag' not more that suggest that perhaps it is time to make some lifestyle changes.
BiologicalActivity.consider: ○ We consider a 'red flag' an 'epigenetic age' that is older than one standard deviation of the test. Standard deviation provides an idea about the distribution in the normal population which at this point of analysis  is 5 years. As more tests are accumulated we will get a more accurate number of the 'normal distribution'.
BiologicalActivity.red: ○ A 'red flag' might prompt you to act on your lifestyle.
BiologicalActivity.information: ○ Our App will link you to information on recommended lifestyle behaviors by important US national medical association. These are updated regularly and we suggest that you keep updating by examining the links periodically. These recommendations are based on what 'science' knows today, they are not perfect. With more data and more analysis science is improving.
BiologicalActivity.update: ○ You will update your lifestyle data as regularly as you wish. You might update all questions, some or none. However, we believe that accurate reporting will provide a more accurate better analysis.
BiologicalActivity.report: ○ Initially our report will show how far are your lifestyle parameters from consensus recommendations. Your data will be anonymized and your data and data from other anonymous users we will be analyzed by artificial intelligence to develop a model based on many users that measures the impact that lifestyle changes have on 'epigenetic clock'. In time as more data is accumulated., the model will be used on your lifestyle data and results of the 'model' will be shared with you.
BiologicalActivity.administer: ○ Our test is simple to administer, low cost, robust and accurate, and is dynamically integrated into a life-long health ecosystem driven by App technology and machine learning.
BiologicalActivity.app: Why do you need questionnaires in the app?
BiologicalActivity.sense: ○ EpiAging tests make sense only within a dynamic life-long lifestyle, environmental and health management system.
BiologicalActivity.personalized: ○ A personalized evaluation including intervention will be generated based on the health and lifestyle information you provided.
BiologicalActivity.health: ○ Updates on your health and lifestyle parameters periodically to activate the life-long personalized analysis report.
BiologicalActivity.questionnaires: Why do you need questionnaires in the app?
BiologicalActivity.chronological: ○ We all know our chronological age. But how old we really are? People age at different rates. Some “look” and “feel” older than their chronological age while other look younger than their chronological age.
BiologicalActivity.life: Our Biological age is a better parameter of our health well being and life span than our chronological age.
BiologicalActivity.know: But how do we know our “biological age”?
BiologicalActivity.identifying: It has been believed that if we can define the true “biological age” we might test and design interventions that will decelerate the rate of biological aging. During the past decades, extensive effort has been invested in identifying different parameters that could predict “biological aging” and life span such as measures of frailty, graying of hair, aging of skin, levels of different kinds of white blood cells. However most of these markers were found to offer no advantage over knowing your chronological age.
BiologicalActivity.longevity: Parameters that predict 'biological aging' and longevity
BiologicalActivity.small: Small technical errors may have a decisive
BiologicalActivity.sampling: Sampling and detection methods are complex and have not been verified in a large number of population samples
BiologicalActivity.closely: is closely related to the biological function of human body, and the acceleration of epigenetic clock is related to the risk of neurodegenerative diseases and cancer.
BiologicalActivity.methylation: epiAging uses a method called DNA methylation to determine your true age — which might, as science is thinking at this time and age, reveal some important information on your true health, and possibly the quality and even span of your life.
BiologicalActivity.already: HKG epi THERAPEUTICS already has three decades of pioneering research in this exciting area of DNA methylation. With our unique method of diagnosing the DNA methylation stored in your cells in saliva, we reveal your actual age, which may encourage you to make lifestyle changes that some evidence suggetss might lead to the following:
BiologicalActivity.extend: Extend The Lenght Of Your Life
BiologicalActivity.fast: How Fast Is Your Biological Clock Ticking?
BiologicalActivity.chronologicaled: If your chronological age is 50 and your biological age is 35, excellent! But if your chronological age is 35 and your biological age says that you’re 50 years old — it might be the alarm calling on you to make life style changes.
BiologicalActivity.possibly: Advanced aging is possibly associated with increased risk of serious illness. Epigenetics may not be The Fountain of Youth but it is The Fountain of Life.
BiologicalActivity.really: So grab the key and learn how old you are, really!
BiologicalActivity.developed: We developed and introduced a convenient and efficient Epiaging detection test.
BiologicalActivity.epitherapeutics: Scientists at HKG epitherapeutics have mined a large number of age-related CG methylation sites in hundreds of published DNA methylation data, and selected a region containing 13 methylation sites from which saliva samples can accurately predict biological age.
BiologicalActivity.steps: Discover Your Biological Age in 5 Simple Steps,change your lifestyle and improve your health
BiologicalActivity.register: Download the app, register and request your EpiAging Test You will then receive your saliva collection tube in the mail.
BiologicalActivity.saliva: Expel your saliva(spit)into the tube, close and seal the envelope and send your test packet to our lab with its self-addressed postage.
BiologicalActivity.step3: STEP 3: ANSWER THE QUESTIONS AND ENTER THE DATA
BiologicalActivity.questionnaire: Open the questionnaire button. Enter your data. Save the data Compare your data with the recommendations and make changes or order nutritional supplements. Report the changes frequently. Higher quality of reporting will enable high quality analysis and a more accurate  personalized recommendation to you. You will get a continuous report on your App describing your progress. Once data accumutates, a personalized report of possible changes will be provided in your App.
BiologicalActivity.analyze: Our state-of-the-art lab will analyze your epi-genetic data to calculate your biological age,and you can view personalized reports through the APP.
BiologicalActivity.step5: STEP 5: MAKE LIFESTYLE CHANGES IMPROVE YOUR HEALTH
BiologicalActivity.lifestyle: We will also analyze your lifestyle data. You keep making changes in lifestyle and report. You get personalized reports on your Progress Order periodically new epiAging tests to assess your progress. A new analysis will be provided with some suggestions. Keep improving and testing your epiAge.
BiologicalActivity.foot: @2019 HKG epi THERAPEUTICS Ltd. All Rights Reserved

SleepChartActivity.title: Sleep Questionnaires
SleepChartActivity.people: Most people experience problems with sleep in their life. In fact, it’s thought that a third of Brits will have episodes of insomnia at some point.
SleepChartActivity.include: The causes can include psychological conditions (Such as depression or anxiety) or a combination of both. This short test from Sleepio will give you a’sleep score ' plus practical tips and advice for improving your sleep.
SleepChartActivity.total: Thinking about a typical night in the last month, if you wake up, how long are you awake for in total?
SleepChartActivity.asleep: Thinking about a typical night in the last month, how long does it take you to fall asleep?
SleepChartActivity.quality: Thinking about a typical night in the last month, how would you rate your sleep quality?
SleepChartActivity.mood: Thinking about the past month, to what extent has poor sleep affected your mood, energy, or relationships?
SleepChartActivity.productivity: Thinking about the past month, to what extent has poor sleep affected your concentration, productivity, or ability to stay awake?
SleepChartActivity.general: Thinking about the past month, to what extent has poor sleep troubled you in general?
SleepChartActivity.problem: 8.How long have you had a problem with your sleep?

DietChartActivity.title: Diet Recommendation
DietChartActivity.calories: An average woman needs to eat about 2000 calories per day to maintain, and 1500 calories to lose one pound of weight per week. An average man needs 2500 calories to maintain, and 2000 to lose one pound of weight per week.

SameActivity.title: Sam-e introduction
SameActivity.sam: SAM-e is a nutritional supplement not a drug.
SameActivity.body: SAM-e (S-Adenosyl Methionine) is a chemical found naturally in the body.
SameActivity.considered: SAM-e is considered the most important methyl donor in the body.
SameActivity.level: The level of SAM-e decreases as the body ages. Concomitantly, a number of health issues,including mood, joint, and liver disorders are likely to occur.
SameActivity.molecules: All SAM-e molecules have two forms: the SS (active) isomer and the RS (inactive) isomer.
SameActivity.tosylate: While SAM-e comes in two stable salt forms; tosylate  and butane disulphanate, only the tosylate form is  backed by twenty years of research for safety and effectiveness.
SameActivity.according: According to clinical studies,sam-e can improve emotional health, joint relaxation and liver function
SameActivity.quality: In March of 2003, the AHRQ (Agency for Healthcare Research and Quality) a division of the United States Health and Human Services, released the findings of a major study on SAM-e.
SameActivity.depression: SAM-e is as effective as conventional prescription medications in the treatment of depression
SameActivity.effective: SAM-e is as effective as standard prescription medications (NSAIDs) in the treatment of osteoarthritis
SameActivity.diseases: SAM-e has significant benefits for patients suffering from various liver diseases.
SameActivity.effects: Natural SAM-e was not found to have any noticeable side effects.
SameActivity.lists: Issue) lists SAM-e as best supplement for osteoarthritis.
SameActivity.highest: SAM-e the highest grade for oral supplement for osteoarthritis relief.
SameActivity.hospital: General Hospital demonstrated that SAM-e combined with antidepressants significantly increased remission rates in patients with major depression who failed conventional therapy.
SameActivity.korean: A Korean study found that SAM-e
SameActivity.as: is as effective as the NSAID Nabumetone.
SameActivity.calfornia: of California showed that SAM-e is as effective as Celecoxib, a prescription drug for Arthritis.
SameActivity.basic: Basic research on SAM-e on human cell lines and animals which were not yet followed by clinical studies
SameActivity.animals: SAM-e was shown to block breast cancer growth and metastasis in experiments on breast cancer cel lines and animals.
SameActivity.shown: SAM-e was shown to block growth of liver cancer cells.
SameActivity.prostate: SAM-e was shown to block growth of prostate cancer cells.
SameActivity.formation: SAM-e was shown to inhibit formation of liver cancer in rats and colorectal cancer in mice.
SameActivity.was: SAM-e was shown to improve memory in a mouse model of Alzheimer disease when taken before onset of symptoms.
SameActivity.standards: Our SAMe is manufactured to the highest standards, using the original Italian method (salt - tosylate disulfate).
SameActivity.consistently: Our SAMe products’ starting raw materials consistently test at the highest SS to RS isomer ratio on the market:
SameActivity.tablets: Our SAMe tablets are enteric coated for optimum absorption by the body.
SameActivity.sealed: Our SAMe tablets are sealed in blister packs to ensure freshness.
SameActivity.potency: Our SAMe is made to guaranteed purity and potency standards.
SameActivity.falvors: No Artifical Flavors, Dairy Free, No Preservatives, Allergen Free, No Yeast or Gluten, Kosher Certified.
SameActivity.minimun: Our SAMe tablets have been tested for a minimum full two year stability rating.
SameActivity.should: SAM-e should not be used in conjunction or in place of treatment recommended by your doctor.
SameActivity.taking: If you're taking medication and considering taking SAM-e as supplementary, consulate your doctor to make sure that SAM-e has no interaction with the medication that you are taking.
SameActivity.ltd: @2019 HKG epi THERAPEUTICS Ltd. All Rights Reserved

DataActivity.title: Data Security
DataActivity.epiaging: EpiAging tests make sense only within a dynamic life-long life style, environmental and health management system.
DataActivity.personalized: A personalized evaluation including intervention will be generated based on the health and lifestyle information you provided.
DataActivity.update: Update your health and lifestyle parameters periodically to activate the life-long personalized analysis report.
DataActivity.how: How do we conduct data analysis ?
DataActivity.test: Epiaging test results are continuously analyzed with general health parameters, personal interventions and outcomes of multiple users using state of the art machine learning algorithms.
DataActivity.analysis: Personalized analysis with some possible routes for improvement.
DataActivity.data: Data in our data base in blinded with respect to personal identity.
DataActivity.access: No access is allowed to your personal information by any one who has access to your health and life style data.
DataActivity.results: Epiaging test results are continuously analyzed with general health parameters, personal interventions and outcomes of multiple users using state of the art machine learning algorithms.
DataActivity.routes: Personalized analysis with some possible routes for improvement.
DataActivity.datain: Data in our data base in blinded with respect to personal identity.
DataActivity.allowed: No access is allowed to your personal information by any one who has access to your health and life style data.
DataActivity.general: Only general conclusions based on a population wide summary will be shared.
DataActivity.information: How  do  we  ensure  that information is confidential ?
DataActivity.privacy: We have data privacy and security management system.
DataActivity.without: Without your explicit consent, we will not share any of your personal data.
DataActivity.will: We will not provide your information or results to employers or health insurance companies of other companies.
DataActivity.unless: Unless we are required to comply with valid court orders, we will not provide information to law enforcement agencies.
DataActivity.learn: Learn more about our privacy clauses.
DataActivity.logged: When you are not logged into the system, your health information and personal user information will be in a'free'state, and no one can find your related information.
DataActivity.not: We will not have or save user's private key to decrypt user data according to our Data Security Statement , please save your only private key.

Manual1Activity.title: How to get epiAging test report
